snippet: Bond managers have had to look harder for ways to cushion against the possibility of rising interest rates.
abstract: Growing concerns about economic slowdowns worldwide set off a flight-to-quality rally in Treasuries during the second quarter; average return for mutual funds focused on long-term government bonds was 10.2 percent; bond managers are seeking ways to cushion against the possibility of rising interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Bond managers have had to look harder for ways to cushion against the possibility of rising interest rates.

headline.seo: Tiny Yields Pose Risks for Bond Funds
